body.name: FIFINE Studio XLR Dynamic Microphone, USB PC Podcast Microphone for Streaming Recording, XLR/USB Vocal Mic with Tap-to-Mute, Gain Knob, Headphones Monitoring-Amplitank K688 White
deliveryMessages: Or fastest delivery Tuesday, February 20. Order within 15 hrs 7 mins
features: [Audio Sound Purity] Celebrating resilience and versatility, the XLR dynamic microphone tailored for vocal podcast recording, with an impressive 130dB SPL, ensures a distortion-free audio experience in capturing audio sound. Focused cardioid pattern of the USB dynamic microphone expertly minimizes interference from ambient noises for the purity of sound with clarity. (Arm stand, mic stand and XLR cable are NOT included)

[Advanced XLR Connectivity] XLR interface amplifies the spatial dimensions of your podcast audio. The XLR dynamic microphone enriches the resonance of your vocals, adding an extra layer of depth, meanwhile, reduces unwanted circuit noise interference. The recording studio XLR microphone strengthen the dynamics and details of your audio. Employ the vocal microphone alongside audio interface or mixer to unveil a more real recording experience.

[Effortless USB Connectivity] USB dynamic microphone for PC use provides the flexibility of USB and XLR interfaces, meeting the multifunctional advantages. The microphone for podcast can be quickly connected to computer, simplifying your recording process and efficiently speeding up recording tasks.

[USB Microphone Functionality] The USB microphone for PC is equipped with essential features to enhance your recording experience. You can instantly silence the PC microphone by the mute button to manage interruptions and also take command of your recording levels with the dedicated volume button. Experience real-time audio monitoring through headphone jack, even to adjust the level of the monitored audio by the monitoring knob.

[Noise Suppression] The XLR recording dynamic microphone mitigates background noises to ensure clear sound quality during recording. The cardioid dynamic XLR microphone with windscreen plays a pivotal role in diminishing the disruptive effects of plosives. Shock mount on the PC microphone gaming serves as a key component to effectively reduce undesirable low-frequency vibrations stemming from the desk and mechanical noise.

Warm Tips: 1. The recording studio product (XLR cable, boom arm, mic stand not included) comes with a dynamic microphone with shock mount, an 8.2ft (2.5m) USB C to USB cable, a 5/8'' to 3/8'' adapter, a user's Manual. 2. When using XLR connection, it is suggested to use XLR to XLR cable for more stable audio. 3. All function keys are only available for USB connection.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 30, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect budget mic
reviews.reviewText: Product Review: FIFINE Dynamic Microphone, XLR/USB Podcast Recording PC MicrophoneAs an aspiring podcaster and content creator, I recently purchased the FIFINE Dynamic Microphone to enhance the audio quality of my recordings. This versatile microphone, with both XLR and USB connectivity options, promised to be a valuable addition to my setup. After putting it to the test, here's my comprehensive review:Design & Build Quality:The FIFINE Dynamic Microphone boasts a classic and sleek design. The microphone feels robust and well-built, with a durable metal body that can withstand regular use. The included tripod stand provides stability during recordings, and the microphone's adjustable angle allows for easy positioning to achieve the best sound capture.Audio Quality & Performance:I must say that I'm impressed with the audio quality of this microphone. Whether connected via XLR or USB, the FIFINE Dynamic Microphone delivers clear and rich sound reproduction. The dynamic range is well-balanced, capturing both low and high frequencies with excellent clarity. This microphone is especially adept at minimizing background noise and handling plosives, resulting in professional-grade audio recordings.Dual Connectivity Options:The dual connectivity options, XLR and USB, are a huge advantage of this microphone. When I'm recording in a studio setting, I can use the XLR connection with my audio interface for the highest audio quality possible. On the other hand, the USB connection comes in handy when I'm on the go or need a quick setup for online meetings or interviews. The versatility offered by these connectivity options makes the FIFINE Dynamic Microphone a great choice for various recording scenarios.Ease of Use:Setting up the FIFINE Dynamic Microphone was a breeze. With the USB connection, it's a plug-and-play experience, which is perfect for beginners or those who prefer a straightforward setup. When using the XLR connection, the microphone integrates seamlessly with my audio interface, and the controls on the microphone are intuitive and easy to operate.Podcast and Streaming Ready:This microphone is particularly well-suited for podcasting and streaming purposes. The excellent sound quality and background noise reduction ensure that my voice comes through clearly, making my podcasts sound professional and engaging. It's also ideal for live streaming sessions, where audio clarity is essential for viewer retention.Portability:The FIFINE Dynamic Microphone's compact and lightweight design makes it easy to transport for on-the-go recording sessions. It's perfect for content creators who need a portable microphone without compromising on audio quality.Value for Money:Considering the reasonable price point, the FIFINE Dynamic Microphone offers exceptional value for money. Its high-quality sound reproduction, dual connectivity options, and overall performance rival more expensive microphones on the market.Final Verdict:The FIFINE Dynamic Microphone, with its XLR/USB connectivity and outstanding audio quality, is an excellent choice for podcasters, content creators, and anyone seeking a versatile and budget-friendly recording solution. Whether you're recording in a studio or on the move, this microphone delivers professional-grade results. With its solid build, ease of use, and impressive performance, the FIFINE Dynamic Microphone is a true contender in its price range and a worthy addition to any content creator's arsenal.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 17, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars FIFINE Dynamic Microphone - A Major Upgrade for my Podcasting & Recording Sessions!
reviews.reviewText: I'm truly impressed by the FIFINE Dynamic Microphone. As an audio enthusiast and an avid podcaster, I am always on the lookout for high-quality equipment that can deliver excellent sound, and this microphone has exceeded my expectations.What immediately caught my attention was the dual XLR/USB connectivity. This feature offers me great flexibility, allowing me to connect the microphone to a variety of devices. Whether I'm recording on my PC using the USB connection or hooking up to an audio interface with the XLR, I've found that the audio quality remains consistently excellent.The sound reproduction from the FIFINE Dynamic Microphone is fantastic. It captures my voice with great clarity, ensuring my listeners can hear every word clearly. The dynamic nature of the mic means it's excellent at rejecting background noise, which has significantly improved the cleanliness of my recordings. Even when I'm not in the most soundproof environments, I've noticed less ambient noise in my podcasts.The build quality is another standout feature. The microphone feels solid and robust in my hands, and it's been able to withstand the rigors of regular use. Plus, the sleek design gives it a professional aesthetic that looks great in my setup.I also appreciate the ease of use. The setup process was straightforward, with no need for additional drivers. Just plug and play, which is perfect for getting down to recording without fuss. The microphone's volume control is a handy feature, allowing me to quickly adjust my input level on the fly.In terms of value for money, I can confidently say that the FIFINE Dynamic Microphone is worth every penny. Given its high-quality sound, sturdy build, and the flexibility offered by its dual connectivity, this microphone has become a key component of my recording setup.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 28, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars This is the one!
reviews.reviewText: I don't think there's a better mic out there for under $80. It's incredibly easy to set up and the quality is fantastic. I love that the mute button is touch so it's silent. I haven't used the XLR yet, but I love that it comes with the option. I really love the way this mic looks. It's sleek and simple.I have a soft voice and with all of the mics I've tried (5-6), people complain that they can't hear or understand me. This mic picks me up clearly and I don't even have the gain turned up to max. It works well with OBS, Discord, and Audacity.

reviews.reviewTitle: Entrega o que promete, boa qualidade pelo preço
reviews.reviewText: Compra efetuado em no dia 30 de novembro aqui pela Amazon, produto entregue no dia 18 de janeiro. Foi taxado pela receita, porém como dito nos termos de importação da Amazon, compra acima de 250 reais quem pagou o imposto foi o vendedor. Chegou um pouco amassada a caixa, sabendo como os correios tratam nossas encomendas, mas o produto veio com plástico bolha bem protegido por dentro. Qualidade de som incrível, cumpre o que promete. Recomendo para quem quer gravar conteúdo e não tem ambiente tratado. Paguei 430 nesse microfone.

Es un micrófono que no le pide nada a muchos de sus competidores directos, es versátil en cuanto a conectividad se refiere, lo que mas me gusto es su calidad de audio (sin ecualizar) es bastante buena y es comparable con opciones mas caras que esta, una vez que lo configurar y le das ciertos retoques a su configuración inicial es cuando mas sobresale sobre otras opciones de mismo precio.Es la mejor opción si no quieres comprar una interfaz de audio y usarlo con USB, aunque también te da la opción de usarlo con XLR y en mi opinion el ruido que puede llegar a meter es muy poco cuando grabas, yo principalmente lo uso para streaming y es una maravilla, lo recomiendo si buscas una opcion estetica y que tenga una calidad buena.
Su precio y su calidad, es buen producto, no tiene desperdicio

El micrófono está bien, cumple con sus espectativas auditivas y visuales, ya que al vista es lindo, pero el audio deja algo que desear (usandolo con ecualización) , vengo del Behringer C1U y la verdad es que para los años que tiene mi anterior micrófono se escucha muchísimo mejor, pero esté cumple bien, le pongo 5 estrellas porque no está mal, mi respuesta a secas es "Bien."
